DOC.brief_summary: This pilot clinical trial study intensity-modulated radiation therapy ( IMRT ) treat young patient lung metastasis . Specialized radiation therapy delivers high dose radiation directly tumor may kill tumor cell cause less damage normal tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Intensity-Modulated Radiation Therapy Treating Younger Patients With Lung Metastases
